attributes.action: Abolish Income Tax and Corporate Taxes and replace it by higher value of VAT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A large % of the tax collected is used to collect the same. It would thus be much better to scrap all the multiple forms of direct and indirect taxes and replace the same with a single form of tax prferably that will have much lowers points of collection.

VAT is a good place to collate all the taxes and the % can be increase to say 30% so that everyone (rich or poor) all have a same level of payment. This will also allow people to save more as if they do not spend, they can save more and hence the economy will also be kick started
